original_text: And the king answered, Chimham shall go over with me, and I will do to him that which shall seem good unto thee: and whatsoever thou shalt require of me, that will I do for thee.
korean_text: 왕이 대답하되 김함이 나와 함께 건너가리니 나는 네가 좋아하는 대로 그에게 베풀겠고 또 네가 내게 구하는 것은 다 너를 위하여 시행하리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Chimham shall go over with me
and I will do to him
that which shall seem good unto thee
and whatsoever thou shalt require of me
that will I do for thee
